title: Machine Learning

title: Large Language Model
description: A large language model (LLM) is a type of artificial intelligence (AI) program that can recognize and generate text, among other tasks.

title: Expert Systems
description: An expert system is AI software that uses knowledge stored in a knowledge base to solve problems that would usually require a human expert

title: Decision Trees
description: A decision tree is one of the most powerful tools of supervised learning algorithms used for both classification and regression tasks.

title: Theory of Mind
description: Theory of Mind refers to the capacity to understand other people by ascribing mental states to them, surmising what is happening
